query:
SELECT
            ir.amount,
            ir.notes,
            ir.optional,
            (
                i.id,
                i.name,
                i.description,
                i.diet_friendly
            ) as "ingredient!: IngredientModel"
            FROM ingredients_recipes AS ir
            JOIN ingredients AS i
                ON i.id = ir.ingredient_id
            WHERE ir.recipe_id = $1
